productDetails.name: Boat Stone 210
productDetails.description:
Product description : 
 Model: Boat Stone 210  
 
 Sound: 3W Output 
 Battery Backup:  8 hours 
 Bluetooth v4.2 with 10m range; Audio Input via AUX & SD Card 
 Memory Card Slot  
 Battery Capacity of 1800mAh delivering a playback time of up to 7 hours (60% volume); 
 Full Charge in about 2.5 hours IPX5 marked water & dust resistant 
  1 Mic for receiving calls 
 Other Inclusions: AUX Cable, Micro USB Charging Cable, Warranty Card, User Manual 
  Stylish Portable Design
